articles.description: Pakistan host England in the second Test in Multan – follow text & score updates plus radio commentary.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England LIVE: second Test, day three, Multan – cricket score, radio commentary and text updates

articles.description: BBC Sport has a look at some of the questions that have arisen from Thomas Tuchel's appointment as England head coach.
articles.title: Thomas Tuchel named England head coach - all you need to know about appointment

articles.description: England opener Ben Duckett says Pakistan can "crumble" and are under "pressure", despite the home side ending day two of the second Test in the stronger position.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England: Ben Duckett says hosts could 'crumble' under 'pressure'

articles.description: Juventus midfielder Paul Pogba says he is "not a cheater" but accepts responsibility for the failed doping test that led to a ban.
articles.title: Paul Pogba: 'I'm not a cheater' - Juventus midfielder on doping ban

articles.description: Arsenal claim a 4-1 win over Valerenga in the Women's Champions League in their first game after Jonas Eidevall's resignation as manager.
articles.title: Arsenal 4-1 Valerenga: Hosts win in Women's Champions League in first game since Jonas Eidevall exit

articles.description: BBC Sport analyses the Formula 1 title battle including the factors that may help Lando Norris overhaul Max Verstappen.
articles.title: Formula 1 title race: What does Lando Norris need to do to beat Max Verstappen?

articles.description: New England assistant Anthony Barry played with Jamie Vardy at Fleetwood Town and started his coaching journey with Accrington Stanley Under-16s.
articles.title: Anthony Barry: New England assistant started coaching journey with Accrington Stanley Under-16s

articles.description: BBC Sport profiles Barcelona and Spain midfielder Aitana Bonmati, one of five nominees for the BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2024 award.
articles.title: BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2024 contender Aitana Bonmati

articles.description: Great Britain win both races on Wednesday to halve New Zealand's lead in the America's Cup in Barcelona.
articles.title: America's Cup: Great Britain cut New Zealand lead to 4-2 in Barcelona

articles.description: Lionel Messi scores his 10th international hat-trick and sets up two goals as Argentina maintain a three-point lead at the top of World Cup qualifying.
articles.title: Argentina 6-0 Bolivia: Lionel Messi scores hat-trick in World Cup qualifying
